author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 10-member gang was arrested by the police on Sunday after it made an attempt to steal a boiler from an old chemical factory in Kosappur.

According to the police, Babu (40) and Damodaran (35), who are scrap dealers by profession, and a few others had been going to the factory every day and to gather scrap material to sell it off.

Early on Sunday morning, they hired a tipper lorry and a truck to carry the boiler, for which they spent nearly Rs. 1 lakh, a police officer said.

However, their attempt was foiled by the police.

“The factory has been closed for many years and has become a hub for anti-social activities. We regularly patrol the area. When we heard about these men and their attempt to steal the boiler, we arrested them,” said an officer from Madhavaram Milk Colony Police Station.
title: Gang’s bid to steal boiler foiled
